resources.string: I come to rescue you whenever you get stuck in browsers.
Does this ever happen to you?
You click a link and you end up stuck in a web page instead of watching a video directly.
Just share a link with me and I will switch apps for you.
Select ALWAYS to tell me to always open that link with a specific app.
Add to Home screen to quickly access your fav links with your fav apps.
Optionally, you can grant USAGE ACCESS and I will detect which browser you are sharing from, and act accordingly.
